cause.description:
Many kids and teens run away from home due to some kind of abuse at home in their families. Help put a stop to it
1. 1 in 3 females and 1 in 6 males in Canada experience some form of sexual abuse before the age of 18.
2. 80% of all child abusers are the father, foster father, stepfather or another relative or close family friend of the victim.
3. 75% of mothers are not aware of the incest in their family
cause.name: Stop Chilhood Abuse
